---
title: DRUGGABILITY_FLOW
---

DRUGGABILITY_FLOW annotates prioritised genes with drug-target information and known compounds.

Key responsibilities

- Query and annotate gene-drug target profiles using DBs such as DGIdb and OpenTargets.

Important parameters

- `run_druggability` - requires `run_prioritisation` to be enabled.

Outputs

- Druggability tables and drug-target links for candidate genes.
